mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_user where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (username, realname, nickname, email, password, telephone, latest_login, delete_yn, id_yn, regdate) VALUES(#{username}, #{realname}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{telephone}, #{latestlogin}, #{deleteyn}, #{idyn}, #{regdate})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password} WHERE username = #{username}
